explains: adv. 轻松地；毫不费劲地

sentences.en: Schumacher adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 舒马赫毫不费力地适应了他的新环境。

sentences.en: There is so much information you can almost effortlessly find the facts for yourself.
sentences.cn: 有这么多信息，你几乎能毫不费力地为自己找到实例。

sentences.en: Her son Peter adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她的儿子彼得不费力地就适应了新环境。
